GET /api.description: Responds with a JSON representation of all available endpoints for this API

GET /api/articles.description: Responds with an array of articles in the database. By default, results are limited to ten per page and ordered by the date on which they were created, with more recent articles listed first. Users may filter results by the value specified in one or more valid queries. The response body includes page_count, which is the article count after the page limit has been applied, and full_count, which is the total number of articles ignoring any page limit

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: If the article_id provided matches an article in the database, an article object will be returned. The object will include a comment_count property indicating the total number of comments on that article

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: If the article_id provided matches an article in the database, an array of comments on that article will be returned. By default, results are limited to ten per page. Users may filter results by the value specified in one or more valid queries

GET /api/users.description: Responds with an array of all users in the database

GET /api/users/:username.description: If the provided username matches a username in the database, a user object will be returned

POST /api/articles.description: Responds with the article object posted by the client. If a value is not provided for article_img_url, it will default to 'No image provided'
